alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Ogle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 4:22PM CDT until July 05 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Ogle County in north central Illinois... Northern De Kalb County in north central Illinois... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 422 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hillcrest, or near Rochelle, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... DeKalb, Sycamore, Rochelle, Genoa, Cortland, Davis Junction, Kirkland, Hillcrest, Maple Park, Kingston, Malta, Creston, Lindenwood, Monroe Center, Fairdale and Kings. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 97 and 114. I-88 between mile markers 75 and 101. This includes... Northern Illinois University. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
